title: {East Arlington 4 Bedroom with parking - Close to Rte 2 and Alewife!}
posting_body: ['East Arlington 4 Bedroom with parking - Close to Rte 2 and Alewife!', 'Arlington / Arlington Line / Alewife', 'Available:', '8/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#174682', 'Apartment Summary', 'Spacious 4 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment on the second and third floor of a two-family home in East Arlington.', 'Spanning two floors, this unit features a living room, dining room, study/office space, hardwood floors throughout, a large eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and new gas stove, front and back porches.', 'Laundry hook-ups and extra storage available in the basement.', 'Off-street parking space for 3-4 cars is included.', 'Located about a block from Massachusetts Ave with easy access to Rt. 2, Alewife station on the red line, and MBTA bus routes to Harvard Square.', '(Reference #174682)', 'Features', 'Washer hook-up in basement, Dryer hook-up in basement, Cable Ready.', 'Off Street Parking Available.', '1 min minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', '12 minute walk to the T.', 'Apartment Details', 'Bath:', '1.5', 'Location:', 'Arlington/Arlington Line', 'Available:', 'August 01, 2022', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Bedrooms:', '4', 'Reference:', '#174682', 'Kitchen:', 'Eat in Kitchen.', ' Separate dining room.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher.', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '857-547-8682', 'Please mention reference #', '174682']
